info.title: Complete Search Results
info.description:
This API product supports a richer data set and library of calls than the Best Execution Search Results product.
            The Full Results allows for QM testing workflows, best price scenarios, and all eligible product scenarios for searches.
            Subsequent calls for more information regarding product and pricing details, ineligible products, and lender fees are also supported.

post.description:
This endpoint will return the full payment stream for the Product provided in the route, including information for each month's payment, 
                monthly/annual mortgage insurance (if applicable) and any rate changes. For Adjustable Rate Mortgages those rate changes and associated 
                payment changes will be based on the fully indexed rate. This endpoint will also return the APR and the values used to determine the APR.

An initiating call to the API, specifying a scenario for qualification purposes. The response will return all eligible products 
                for the submitted scenario and associated guideline documents.
                A flag can also be sent for Optimal Blue to calculate the total loan amount for government transactions, in which case 
                the total loan upfront mortgage insurance premiums will be considered as fully financed. If any portion needs to be paid in 
                cash, or conventional borrower paid upfront MI is required please submit the entire Total Loan Amount container with the 
                calculateTotalLoanAmount field as 'false'. The product guidelines in the response are optional, 
                and can be excluded from the response if you append ?$deselect=Products/Guidelines to the end of the request.

get.description:
Once the eligible products are returned from a Products request, an additional call can be made to receive all detailed pricing information for a product. 
                The response will return all price, rate, lock period combinations for the requested product. Additionally, all adjustments, notes and advisories will be returned.

By providing a valid search ID and product ID, this request will query for all configured fees. These include 'non-pricing' related fees. 
                Please note Origination charges, LO comp, Discount Points, and LLPAs will be returned in the original Price Details Response. Also, 
                aggregated totals, like Total Closing Costs, will be returned in the Price Details Response. The Lender Fees request will be used to 
                collect those fees that were configured to affect APR. Please note, in order for the Optimal Blue generated APR to be accurate, 
                Lender Fees must be configured within Optimal Blue.

get.summary: Product Group Details for Best Price
get.description:
Based on the Product Group ID provided in this request, the results will provide a full price grid for each rate, price, lock period combination. 
                Each option will display the best price across all eligible products for that combination. There will be an indicator as to which product is tied to each combination. 
                The product guidelines in the response are optional, and can be included in the response if you append ?includeguidelines=true to the end of the request.

post.description:
This initiating call to the API identifies the loan/borrower scenario and criteria for qualification purposes. 
                The response will return a list of product groups. Each group will correlate to the product tree within the client's Optimal Blue configuration, 
                or with the custom grouping as configured by the user. The grouping will consolidate all products within that group into one price grid that will 
                display the best price at each rate, price combination for the specified lock period. The results of this call will mirror the functionality of 
                the 'Best Price' tab on the Optimal Blue search results page today.
                Please note that a flag can be sent for Optimal Blue to calculate the total loan amount for government transactions, in which case the total loan 
                upfront mortgage insurance premiums will be considered as fully financed. If any portion needs to be paid in cash, or conventional borrower paid 
                upfront MI is required please submit the entire Total Loan Amount container with the calculateTotalLoanAmount field as 'false'.
                Please note that the fields within the \"expandedGuidelines\" container will only be evaluated for those products that are 
                tied to the \"productTypes\" of \"nonQM\". The product guidelines in the response are optional,
                and can be excluded from the response if you append ?$deselect=ProductGroups/Guidelines to the end of the request.

get.description: This endpoint will return the MI Comparison PDF.

post.description:
This endpoint will enable users to receive a BestX MI quote by providing a scenario in the request body.
                Users will specify a coverageType (when set to \"NonStandard\" users will also need to specify a \"nonStandardCoveragePercent) as well as an indicator
                if the search should be a BestX MI search across all configured MI providers (and corresponding Master Policy Numbers) for the Business Channel specified
                in the route. If users set the \"bestExSearch\" to \"False\", users can specify what MI providers they wish to run the search through (if they only wish to retrieve
                results from a subset of configured providers or an individual provider). All other information required by the MI providers to provide an accurate quote will
                need to be provided in the request. The response will list out all providers configured (or provided in the request), each eligible product (\"category\") that is returned,
                the corresponding rank for BestX, and the corresponding premium/product details. The 'transactionId' field should be sent in the request to indicate what transaction the
                MI BestX search is tied to. This will allow us to determine if this is a brand new quote, or a subsequent search off of a previous transaction. Please note, the endpoint 
                is not authorized to be used in a direct to consumer transaction.

This endpoint will take in the loan information and the target results for a single product from a previous search scenario and will return AI generated suggestions on how to improve the rate and/or price. For each suggestion the endpoint will display the fields used in the suggestions and the value used to calculate the improvement. The request body for this endpoint will have two main components, the "loanProfile" and the "searchResultInformation".  The "loanProfile" will be the loan data used in the initial search while the "searchResultInformation" will be data from the search results or search details call. The root will be the calculated fields returned in the bottom of the search such as the "totalLoanAmountDetails" and LTV/CLTV/HCLTV fields.  The "targetProduct" will be the quote information from the search results.

targetProduct.productName: U.S. Bank National Association - Correspondent -  FNMA Conforming 30 Yr Fixed
U.S. Bank National Association - Correspondent -  FNMA Conforming 30 Yr Fixed
